series.title: A History of Britain
series.description:
A History of Britain is a three volume work written by Simon Schama to accompany a series of documentaries he presented for the BBC.
    
    The volumes are:
    
    A History of Britain: At the Edge of the World? 3500 BC–AD 1603
    A History of Britain: The British Wars 1603–1776
    A History of Britain: The Fate of Empire 1776–2000

best_book.title: A History of Britain: At the Edge of the World? 3500 BC-AD 1603 (A History of Britain, #1)

work.original_title: A History of Britain: At the Edge of the World 3500 BC-AD 1603

best_book.title: The Story of the Jews: Finding the Words, 1000 BCE – 1492 CE
